/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -std=c++11 -std=gnu++11 -rdynamic -DUNICODE -D_UNICODE -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS -D_BIND_TO_CURRENT_CRT_VERSION   -shared -Wl,-soname,libalerts.so -o libalerts.so CMakeFiles/alerts.dir/alerts.o -L/usr/local/lib64 -lasound -lpthread -lcurl -lplayercore -lpthread -lltdl -ldl -lplayerinterface -lplayercommon -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib64
